Description:
“Allow Azure services and resources to access this server” setting for SQL allows a trivial bypass for Azure firewall. Essentially meaning, that if attacker gets the SQL connection string, the protection by network rules does very little to protect from the attack. 
- Unfortunately many Azure Services rely on this setting to access SQL. Consider using this setting only if managed identities are in the ACL for SQL
